title: Anna Wintour Ends 37-Year Run as American 'Vogue' Editor in Chief
description: It's the end of an era — kind of. During a Thursday staff meeting, Anna Wintour announced that she's stepping down from her role as American Vogue's editor-in-chief, which she's held since 1988. She will, however, continue on as chief content officer for Condé Nast and as Vogue's global ...Continue reading
author: Fashionista
